pages.text: Breezevine Spell Essence contains the concentrated magical properties of directional wind. Extracted from the Breezevine Flower Bloom, it embodies the focused nature of controlled air currents.

pages.title: Properties
pages.text: When cast directly, Breezevine Essence propels you backwards with a powerful gust of wind while granting brief fall protection, making it excellent for mobility and escape.$(br2)Mana Cost: [value]$(br)Single-use when cast directly

pages.title: Extraction
pages.text: The extraction process requires a Breezevine Flower Bloom and special directional catalysts to focus the wind properties during transformation.

pages.title: Applications
pages.text: - Direct casting for mobility$(br)- Grafting onto a Living Staff$(br)- Creating propulsion devices$(br)- As a component in directional air-based magical items$(br)- Used in crafting items that provide fall protection
